string.text: This is test phrase. ֱנוה סףלאסרוהרודמ.
d2
Help... Help...
Whoa... Yeah, Mr. Soldier, I see you're spoiled a bit...
Screw you, scoundrel!
Are you a... hem... monolithian? I've he-e-ard... colonel called you so..
If I were one of them, you wouldn't have a chance to talk now... I am Branded one, stalker. And what kind of nut are you?
I'm... a corporal... Vasiliy Luckless...
Yeah, well that's for certain.
Who... who else has survived?
Not likely. Damn, I should have a medical aid from the doctor not from the medikit.
Apparently, it's my time to go... with comrades...
Hush for a while. Sooner or later we'll all be there.
Well, I'm not holding you back.
Thanks, man... Colonel siad...that you all had to be some kind of inhuman brutes here... kh... while you seem to be pretty sane...
Yeah, there's a plenty of brutes here, that's for sure. Tell me more, who did it to you?
No, my friend. I'm not that sound - it just looks to be so. I'm going to fry you up and eat... in fact, forget the fry stuff.

Like kids... hem... There was a radiochemical reconnaissance... led by the copters... they had too much trust \nin those ones... and where wiped out in a jiffy... And then you column was blocked up... and as well was screwed... Only I made it.. \nto... knock a couple of foes off...
Fighting-cocks.. It took a few seconds for you to appear here! The radar has just shut down.
A month... two steps from here, on the border of the zone we were... fully prepared.. Battle.. the battle still there?..
This is the case in point. Someone was really noisy there.
Maybe someone of us, alive... could settle there... We had... a task - to secure the path to Sarco... hk... khe... Sarcophagus... if \nsomething happens - we must wait for reinforcements..
Reinforcements?
Our pop... colonel told that there should be merely no rebuff there... just beasts... few monstrosities...
So what's with the reinforcements?
There is the task force... as well, once we have failed, they'll begin... I though we'll make a skirmish there... keh... a bit... and the battle broke out here... Don't walk straight the road...
Goofy! What was it about the task force?... Look at me! Don't close your eyes, will ya!
A-a-a, it hurts!.. Oh, take me home... no chance to break through without the copters...
Sergeant?
Yes... sergeant Lucklezy Gled... The enemy has at least three machine-gun dots and several snipers encamped... Man, you'd better \nnot.. don't go there... keh..
Few more seconds, sergeant! When a hell... When this cursed task force arrives?
Huh?.. Stalker... task force... we were knocked out, it... now....
Now? Oh my gosh...
Kh... And you... what have brought you here... kh...
I wanted to get to the Monolith, but there you are...

I would... also like to glance at it... but, apparently it's not my fate... take my PDA... keh... there is a sarcophagus assault plan...All our groupings... are indicated ... Perhaps, you will be lucky ... to break through... and Monolith will... grant your wish...
Thanks.
Was the explosion of 1986 the work of yours as well?

No! We have nothing to do with it. Most of us was only starting the scientific activity then. Someone just decided to gain promotion \nvia intensive mindwork and hence transgress the processing of reactor functionining. Human's blunder. As it's said, "Today, for \npeace the atom’s nursed; while Europe says it should be cursed".
What are those "death trucks"?

Any production has waste products. Nearly the half of all stalkers die during enlistment. We consider it to be a natural selection. \nThose who can't manage to bear it are removed. Someone thought that you couldn't stand the draft and you were located to one of \nthe trucks. But you proved to be stronger.
I'm not helping you with deceiving people.
So what, Gunslinger, it's high time to come back to you with the answers to all your questions.
Gunslinger, it's your choice to make.
What does your S.T.A.L.K.E.R. tatooo means?

S.T.A.L.K.E.R. - is one of the traps, meant for concealing our project. The device itself is situated inside APP's sarcophagus. You 
are more inclined to call it Monolith. Everyone who desires the wish granting become our marionette. You receive the mark and 
you're inculcated in that you have a task, which has to be accomplished. Something turned not right with you. Because you've been 
instructed to kill yourself.
What happened to me?

You're a small screw that dropped out of the mechanism. And the mechanism turned out to be that big, that we didn't notice you 
falling out. Since the moment when Zone emerged, many have tried to get to its center and find out what's in there. But we can't 
afford it. The humanity isn't ready for it yet. Thus we've "recruited" braves, like you, tempting you with your own crapulence. And sent 
you to protect the mystery of the Zone.
What is the Zone? How did it emerge?

Zone is a result of hasty intervention into the Earth's noosphere. Such an interference was followed by a local noosphere slit. \nSingular surgical cut. Zone is just a demonstration of this cut on the Earth.
What will happen to us?

What will be next depends on you. You see, the Zone is swelling. We are trying to keep it back, but your vigor isn't infinite. Besides, 
too many of them were spent to struggle with you. You can't just eliminate us physically. All that you see here is just an illusion. 
Our bodies are in anabiosis deep under the soild. You can join us and we, with your strength and knowlegde, will be able to hold 
back the growing of the Zone. You may not join, but otherwise, you won't leave this room.
Who are you?

I'm not the only one. We are a group of well-known scientists, who decided to change the world. According to Vernadskiy theory the 
Earth is surrounded with the informational field - noosphere. It is closely connected with all the thinking beings on the Earth. We've 
made a decision to make minor alterations to the noosphere, in order to utterly remove malice, violence and greed from human 
thoughts. But none of the human minds possesses the power enough to perceive the noosphere. We've combined our 
consciousnesses into one and become the most intelligent being on the planet Earth.
Why all that have happened in Chernobyl?

Heh. It was the best option of all. First of all there are virtually no people left after the accident in 1986. We could function without 
being afraid of exposure. In the second place there are powerful antennas left nearby Chernobyl ever since USSR time, which were 
used in experiments on influencing human conscoiusnesses. In general here was the all the fundament which allowed us to 
establish the connection with noosphere.
I agree to join "C-Consciousness" project.
